pr_title: GG-21923 Fix nodes not joining baseline topology after enabling auto adjust

timeline.message: GG-21923 Fix nodes not joining baseline topology after enabling auto adjust

timeline.bodyText:
I believe it is better not to add second method here. You can rename onEvent -> triggerBaselineUpdate and class ChangeTopologyWatcher to something like BaselineTopologyUpdater.
And then registration of events(EVT_NODE_FAILED, EVT_NODE_LEFT, EVT_NODE_JOINED) should be modified according to using triggerBaselineUpdate(long topologyVersion)
timeline.author: akalash

timeline.bodyText: You can add awaitPartitionMapExchange() after startGrid(1); then you can check ignite0.cluster().nodes().size() without waitForCondition. Also you must check  that currentBaselineTopology().size() equal to 1 before auto-adjust enabled.
timeline.author: akalash
